projectId.description: The STACKIT portal project UUID the key ring is part of.
projectId.name: projectId

regionId.description: The STACKIT region name the key ring is located in.
regionId.name: regionId

badRequest.description: Bad Request. Malformed parameters or invalid body.

conflict.description: Conflict. Requested resource encounters an issue that makes it not ready to use.

forbidden.description: Forbidden. Requested action is not allowed to be performed on the resource.

internalServerError.description: Internal server error. The application experienced some unexpected situation.

notFound.description: Not found. Requested resource has not been found.

serviceUnavailable.description: Operation unavailable. Key is not available to execute this operation.

unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. You may have provided no or wrong credentials.

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple keys.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple keys. Valid characters: letters, digits, underscores and hyphens.

importOnly.description: States whether versions can be created or only imported.

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple key rings.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple key rings. Valid characters: letters, digits, underscores and hyphens.

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple wrapping keys.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple wrapping keys. Valid characters: letters, digits, underscores and hyphens.

data.description: The data that has to be decrypted. Encoded in base64.
The data that has to be encrypted. Encoded in base64.

wrappedKey.description: The wrapped key material that has to be imported. Encoded in base64.

wrappingKeyId.description: The unique id of the wrapping key the key material has been wrapped with.

data.description: The data that has to be signed. Encoded in base64.
The data to be verified. Encoded in base64.

signature.description: The signature of the data. Encoded in base64.

access_scope.description: The access scope of the key.

algorithm.description: The algorithm the key material uses.

data.description: The decrypted data. Encoded in base64.
The encrypted data. Encoded in base64.

message.description: A string that gives a short information about what went wrong.

createdAt.description: The date and time the creation of the key was triggered.

deletionDate.description: This date is set when a key is pending deletion and refers to the scheduled date of deletion

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple keys.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple keys.

id.description: A auto generated unique id which identifies the keys.

importOnly.description: States whether versions can be created or only imported.

keyRingId.description: The unique id of the key ring this key is assigned to.

state.description: The current state of the key.

createdAt.description: The date and time the creation of the key ring was triggered.

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple key rings.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple key rings.

id.description: A auto generated unique id which identifies the key ring.

state.description: The current state of the key ring.

protection.description: The underlying system that is responsible for protecting the key material.

data.description: The data that was signed. Encoded in base64.

signature.description: The signature of the data. Encoded in base64.

valid.description: Whether or not the data has a valid signature.

createdAt.description: The date and time the creation of the key was triggered.

destroyDate.description: The scheduled date when a version's key material will be erased completely from the backend

disabled.description: States whether versions is enabled or disabled.

keyId.description: The unique id of the key this version is assigned to.

keyRingId.description: The unique id of the key ring the key of this version is assigned to.

number.description: A sequential number which identifies the key versions.

publicKey.description: The public key of the key version. Only present in asymmetric keys.

state.description: The current state of the key.

wrappingAlgorithm.description: The wrapping algorithm used to wrap the key to import.

createdAt.description: The date and time the creation of the wrapping key was triggered.

description.description: A user chosen description to distinguish multiple wrapping keys.

displayName.description: The display name to distinguish multiple wrapping keys.

expiresAt.description: The date and time the wrapping key will expire.

id.description: A auto generated unique id which identifies the wrapping keys.

keyRingId.description: The unique id of the key ring this wrapping key is assigned to.

publicKey.description: The public key of the wrapping key.

state.description: The current state of the wrapping key.

wrappingPurpose.description: The wrapping purpose for the wrapping key.

info.description: This API provides endpoints for managing keys and key rings.
info.title: STACKIT Key Management Service API

get.description: Returns a list of all key rings within the project.

200.description: Successful response with all key rings.

post.description: Creates a new key ring within the project.

delete.description: Deletes the given key ring if it is empty

get.description: Returns the details for the given key ring.
Returns the keys for the given key ring.

200.description: All keys for the key ring have been returned.

post.description: Creates a new key for the given key ring.

202.description: The key has been created for the key ring.

delete.description: Schedules the deletion of the given key

get.description: Returns the details for the given key.

200.description: The details for the key have been successfully returned.

post.description: Imports a new version to the given key.
Restores the given key from being deleted.

get.description: Returns a list of all versions of a given key.

200.description: The list of key versions have been successfully returned.

get.description: Returns the details for the given version.

200.description: The details for the version have been successfully returned.

post.description: Decrypts data using the given key version.
Removes the key material of a version permanently.

204.description: The version has been successfully destroyed.
The version has been successfully disabled.
The version has been successfully enabled.

post.description: Encrypts data using the given key version.
Restores the given version from being destroyed

204.description: The version has been successfully restored.

post.description: Sign data using the given key version as secret.

200.description: The message has been signed using the key version.

post.description: Verify data using the given key version as secret.

200.description: The message has verified using the key version.

get.description: Returns the wrapping keys for the given key ring.

200.description: All wrapping keys for the key ring have been returned.

post.description: Creates a new wrapping key for the given key ring.

202.description: The wrapping key has been created for the key ring.

get.description: Returns the details for the given wrapping key.

200.description: The details for the wrapping key have been successfully returned.
